Package m2mimud.state

Interface Summary
MapViewer The MapViewer interface is for objects who wish to be notifed about the area around the player, i.e.
MerchantListener This interface is used by any objects who are informed about the broadcast from a merchant.
MobListener The moblistener is an object which is notifed when a mob moves, respawns, or attacks its targets.
TimeListener The interface for the listener who is notified when time goes off.
 

Class Summary
GameState The GameState is the class which contains all the state information about the session that the user is in.
House The house object contains all the information needed for a player.
ItemData The ItemData object is the object which stores the information about the items.
Merchant The merchant class is really the manager for the merchant.
Mob A mob in an online game does not refer to a large collection of people (which is usually called a zerg).
MobData The MobData file contains all the information about the various types of mobs in the game
MobKey The Mob Key object is used to uniquely identify each mob.
MobMove The movement class for a mob
MoveData The base class for a move data object, which contains information regarding a move.
PlayerCharacter The PlayerCharacter class is the objeect representation of the player's character, or toon.
PlayerClass The PlayerClass class is the blueprint for a played class.
Room The room class contains information about a single room.
TextMessage The TextMessage class is used to allow a class to return a large chuck of text data that can be printed using different colors
TimeManager The time manager class is responsible for keeping track of the game time.
UserMove The object which contains information about the movement for a player
World The world class is the, for lack if a better word, the world.
WorldConfiguration This class contains the configuration information needed for creating a world from a file
XYloc The XYloc is a simple class which holds information about an xy location.
